name: biocentric
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the belief that all living things are equally important: The view of the earth as a home is biocentric, as it acknowledges that all species belong on earth interdependently. In a preface to the new edition of his book, the writer discusses the future of wilderness and its ethical and biocentric relevance.
More examplesFewer examplesThe writer believes that a biocentric revolution is what is needed to stave off ecological disaster. The two philosophers could not be more apart in their worldviews--one believes in biocentric holism and the other in anthropocentric individualism, that humans should come first among all creatures.
